author: Poppy Rhys
description: An ordinary night at Revolution 5, right? Wrong. So wrong.Dania just wanted a normal life on Dor Nye after years of living a nomadic existence among the stars. But when a rude and dangerous alien playboy sits down at the bar where she works, everything changes.No questions. No strings. No names.Suddenly her future flies into a tailspin that lands her back in the lawless wild west of space. It's a fight for life, love, and a future she didn't think was possible any longer.Will she survive it?WARNING: This story contains M/F/M, non-human alien heroes, a chubby heroine, mature content, graphic language, and some violence against women. Possible triggers for sensitive readers.
title: The Melier: Prodigal Son
